name: You got closer to the man.
description: The man stands unnervingly still. You notice that his eyes lack pupils. As you approach him, you hear a faint whisper, but fail to make out words.

actions.name: Wave your hand in front of him

effect.description: He either doesn't notice or doesn't care.

As soon as you touch him, he opens his mouth as if to start screaming, but instead he remains silent and his body begins to fall to pieces. In mere seconds, there is nothing left of him but dust, which is now floating everywhere. You leave the place, desperately trying not to inhale the remains.

actions.name: Try to take a sample from him

effect.description:
As soon as you touch him, his body begins to fall to pieces. You've managed to collect some before they became too fine to be useful. In mere seconds, there is nothing left of him but dust, which is now floating everywhere. You leave the place, desperately trying not to inhale the remains.
You've discovered that his dust greatly improves the deadliness of your blight solution.

actions.name: Leave him and search the ruins

effect.description: You decided to search the ruins first.
